title: How to Make Red Lentil and Tomato Soup

methods.name: Creamy red lentil and tomato soup

steps.headline: Heat oil gently in a large saucepan.
Add the chopped onion.
steps.description: Cook gently until softened, using a low heat. Stir regularly to prevent sticking. This should take about 10 minutes.

steps.headline: Pour in the milk, stock and chopped tomatoes.
Add the lentils.
steps.description: Season with salt and pepper to taste.

methods.name: Spicy red lentil and tomato soup

steps.headline: Chop the onion into small pieces.
Pour oil into the large saucepan.
steps.description: Add the chopped onion and sauté.

steps.headline: Add the lentils and spices.
steps.description: Stir for one minute while cooking. Do not stop stirring or the lentils and spices will begin to stick and burn.

steps.headline: Pour in the water.
steps.description: Add the tomato concentrate and salt to taste.

steps.headline: Bring to the boil.
steps.description: Then turn down to a simmer and cook until the lentils soften.

text: Creamy red lentil and tomato soup Heat oil gently in a large saucepan.  Add the chopped onion. Cook gently until softened, using a low heat. Stir regularly to prevent sticking. This should take about 10 minutes. Pour in the milk, stock and chopped tomatoes. Stir everything together. Add the lentils. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Finished.  Spicy red lentil and tomato soup Chop the onion into small pieces.  Pour oil into the large saucepan. Add the chopped onion and sauté. Add the lentils and spices. Stir for one minute while cooking. Do not stop stirring or the lentils and spices will begin to stick and burn. Pour in the water. Add the tomato concentrate and salt to taste. Bring to the boil. Then turn down to a simmer and cook until the lentils soften. Serve immediately.
